column4: can i get a little help with adobe flash for firefox? i dl and installed it by what i found on the forums, but firefox still doesn't see it when i hit about:plugins. and i don't think it's working
can i get a little help with adobe flash for firefox? i dl and installed it by what i found on the forums, but firefox still doesn't see it when i hit about:plugins. and i don't think it's working
did you get flash 9 from the macromedia site ? then unzip and run the script
can i just use the instruction on adobes site to install?
hang on I'll quickly look it up
thanks
let's start from scratch:   wget http://fpdownload.macromedia.com/get/flashplayer/current/install_flash_player_9_linux.tar.gz
tar zxvf install_flash_player_9_linux.tar.g
cd install_flash_player_9_linux
shutdown firefox and do ./flashplayer-installer
i just run those 2 scripts?
yes :) and then when it asks the directory enter /var/lib/mozilla-firefox
i get no file or directory when running  .flashplayer-installer
command not found
try again because I don't see your message
talk here then because I can't see sorry
ok
in what directory are you ?
I'll be right back need to run down to check the printer
thanks. i did the wget, now what?
tar zxvf install_flash_player_9_linux.tar.gz
hang on
please read the bottom most post in this thread, those are the commands you need to run http://www.blicbox.be/uieforum?c=showthread&ThreadID=27&page=1#lastpost
